description.value:
Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

If your next action is to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Cast a Spell]{Cast a Spell} that doesn't have the darkness trait, has no duration, and requires creatures to attempt a Reflex save, the spell explodes in a spray of scintillating lights, in addition to its other effects.

Each creature that failed its Reflex save against the spell is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} for 1 round, and those who critically failed are instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} for 1 round.
